metadata.name: Ethereum 01 (a) - #1 - Large
metadata.description:
Ethereum 01 is the companion NFT to the Swaps by Coldie Series 1 drop that took place 4.20.22

Initial sale of the Swaps by Coldie Series 1 will include a physical IRL wearable that is integrated with the Kong V1 NFC chip (tap/scan authentication on mobile), CryptoVoxels wearables and this NFT in a single bundle.

Originally created in 2019, Swaps is a fashion project that combines IRL and Web3 to create unique wearable crypto art. This NFT is the original art for the IRL shirt designs. A true companion to the IRL wearables, these NFTs are numbered to match the NFC chips integrated into the shirts.

Initial sale of this token grants the owner this NFT, an IRL T-shirt, and a pair of CryptoVoxels ready metaverse wearables.  
Secondary sales of this token are for this NFT only.
